T02D1349:20a-1: shr'i manbi ma la pra bh'a tantr'a ba ta ra ni b'a d'a tsa la hri da y'a lo ka:/
T02D1349:20a-3: dpal ldan dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od kyi rgyud
T02D1349:20a-4: la 'jug pa'i bshad sbyar mi g-yo ba'i snying po
T02D1349:20a-5: snang ba / dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1349:20a-6: bcom ldan phyin ci ma log rtogs gang mngon par byang chub rdo rje bzhi rnams dang //
T02D1349:20a-7: rnam thar tshangs pa zhes bya skad cig sku bzang sems dpa' zhes pa dang bcas dang //
T02D1349:20a-8: rnal 'byor dga' ba bzhi dang nyi ma ri bong can so yan lag dang bcas pa //
T02D1349:20a-9: mtha' dag rnams kyis 'khor ba rnam dag ston mdzad
T02D1349:20a-10: ston pa de la 'dud gyur cig / gang gis
T02D1349:20a-11: mngon du byed pa yang dag sbyor ba 'gyur med
T02D1349:20a-12: pa // zla ba thig le dag pa rnam rgyas rim pas 'phel gyur pa //
T02D1349:20a-13: shes rab las byung sa rnams rnam par rol par byed pa yis //
T02D1349:20a-14: dpal ldan rgyud kyi rab gsal rdo rje'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1349:20a-15: sngags la sogs pa 'gyur med tshul dang ldan pa'i chu gter shes rab kyis mthar byed bdag nyid //
T02D1349:20a-16: phyugs bdag la sogs bla ma'i bla ma yi yang bla ma dpal ldan byang chub rdo rje ste //
T02D1349:20a-17: mnga' bdag mthu yis yang dag byang chub rdzogs par mdzad pa'i zhabs kyi chu skyes bdud dang ni //
T02D1349:20a-18: nyon mongs lag ldan dbang bo'i bum pa 'byed la
T02D1349:20b-0: gcan @20b gzhan mchog rnams rtsen la spyi bos 'dud
T02D1349:20b-1: // 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis legs par bzlas rnams gang
T02D1349:20b-2: na zhig /'phags pa 'jig rten dbang pos dpyad pa'ang
T02D1349:20b-3: gang na zhig / long pa rig pa ngan pa
T02D1349:20b-5: de yis bkod pa'i cha la yang dag 'bad byas te //
T02D1349:20b-6: 'on kyang spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje'i zho sha yis //
T02D1349:20b-7: drangs bzhin pa yis de nas 'jig rten 'bad pa yis //
T02D1349:20b-8: dpyad pa de rnams dag gis dri ma med 'od kyi //
T02D1349:20b-9: rgyud la 'jug pa la ni bshad sbyar rnam par bsgrub //
T02D1349:20b-10: 'dir dang por re zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
T02D1349:20b-11: dbang phyug gi sprul pa'i sku sa'i bdag po padma
T02D1349:20b-12: dkar pos bcom ldan 'das kyi nyung du'i rgyud kyi
T02D1349:20b-13: rgya cher 'grel pa dri ma med pa'i 'od rtsom
T02D1349:20b-14: bzhin pas / bdud dang bgegs mtha' dag rnam par gzhig pa'i don dang /
T02D1349:20b-15: rab tu gsal ba'i rdo rje'i gnas lugs rgyud kyi
T02D1349:20b-16: gsang chen las shin tu gsang chen rdo rje'i rnal
T02D1349:20b-17: 'byor ma lus pa rtogs pa'i don du /
T02D1349:20b-18: mchog tu 'dod pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal ba gsungs pa /
T02D1349:20b-19: dpal ldan dus 'khor la phyag 'tshal zhes pa rgyas par ro //
T02D1349:20b-20: dpal gnyis su med pa'i don dang ye shes kyis
T02D1349:20b-21: nye bar mtshon pa ni bcom ldan 'das dus kyi
T02D1349:20b-22: 'khor lo ste / dus ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po'i skad cig yin la /
T02D1349:20b-23: nges pa bskyed pa'i sgrib pa med pa'i phung po dang /
T02D1349:20b-24: khams la sogs pa 'khor lo ste //
T02D1349:20b-25: gang gi sku 'di yin pa ni dus kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1349:20b-26: de la phyag 'tshal bar gyur cig ces pa'o //
T02D1349:20b-27: stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1349:20b-28: zhes pa 'dir 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i shes bya ni stong pa yin la /
T02D1349:20b-29: de mthong ba ni dngos po ste stong pa nyid
T02D1349:20b-30: rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan pa'i shes rab
T02D1349:20b-31: po zhes pa'o // 'dir phung po rnam par dpyad pa'i stong pa nyid ni ma yin te /
T02D1349:20b-33: phung po rnam dpyad stong pa rnams //
T02D1349:20b-34: chu shing ji bzhin snying po med //
T02D1349:20b-35: rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i //
T02D1349:20b-36: stong nyid de ltar 'gyur ma yin //
T02D1349:20b-37: skyes ba med pa 'gag med pa'i //
T02D1349:20b-38: shes bya gang zhig 'dir mthong ba'i //
T02D1349:20b-39: stong pa'i dngos po'i stong pa nyid //
T02D1349:20b-40: phung po rnams rnam dpyad pa min //
T02D1349:20b-42: kam bde ba 'gog par byed pas na snying rje ste //
T02D1349:21a-2: mngon par shes pa drug can no //
T02D1349:21a-4: srid gsum skye dang 'jig pa med //
T02D1349:21a-5: shes dang shes bya gcig pa'i sku //
T02D1349:21a-6: zhes pa srid pa gsum 'dod pa dang gzugs dang
T02D1349:21a-7: gzugs med pa'i khams lus dang ngag dang yid kyi
T02D1349:21a-8: skye ba dang 'jig pa srid pa dang /
T02D1349:21a-9: mya ngan las 'das pa yin la /
T02D1349:21a-10: ye shes de la ni med de cha bcu drug
T02D1349:21a-11: gcig pa nyid kyi phyir cha bcu drug pa cha
T02D1349:21a-13: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1349:21a-14: yang yang gtsug tor du 'char ba //
T02D1349:21a-15: slar yang rdo rje nor bur rdzogs //
T02D1349:21a-16: de chags bral las cha nyams pa //
T02D1349:21a-17: lus can ye shes nyams pa min //
T02D1349:21a-19: de la gang la dngos po ste //
T02D1349:21a-20: yod pa nyid med pa de skad cig gcig gis
T02D1349:21a-21: mngon par byang chub pa nyid kyi phyir 'dod pa'i
T02D1349:21a-22: srid pa la sogs pa la gnas pa ma yin
T02D1349:21a-23: / 'dod pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa la mi gnas //
T02D1349:21a-24: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag la mi gnas te phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir la /
T02D1349:21a-25: 'di dag gi phyi rol yang ma yin te /
T02D1349:21a-26: gtsub shing gtsungs [?] pa las me bzhin 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D1349:21a-27: 'dir shes pa ni sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'i mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i skad cig ste /
T02D1349:21a-28: shes bya yang khams gsum pa'i dngos po mtha' yas pa mthong ba yin la /
T02D1349:21a-29: de kho na nyid du rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer med pa'i phyir /
T02D1349:21a-30: 'di dag gcig pa nyid gnyis su med pa 'di'i sku ste /
T02D1349:21a-31: de ni cha 'gyur ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:21a-33: kun nas phyag dang zhabs la sogs //
T02D1349:21a-34: kun nas spyan dang dbu dang zhal //
T02D1349:21a-35: kun nas thos ldan 'jig rten du //
T02D1349:21a-36: thams cad khyab par byas te gnas //
T02D1349:21a-38: tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis phyi nas khyad par gyi bsdu ba ste /
T02D1349:21a-39: de'i phyir tshig bzhi rnams kyis sku bzhi'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das brjod par bya ba yin la /
T02D1349:21a-40: 'di'i brjod par byed pa yang po ti dang gzhung dang /
T02D1349:21a-41: don dang rtogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D1349:21a-42: phyag 'tshal ba yang rim pas shes bya ste /
T02D1349:21a-43: ji skad du lus kyis spyi bor son pas dang /
T02D1349:21a-45: bus mo'i lha ngas la son pas dang /
T02D1349:21a-46: ngag gi gzhung klog pa dang /
T02D1349:21a-47: yid kyi don bsgom pa dang /
T02D1349:21b-0: @21b ye shes kyi don rtogs pa'o zhes rjod par byed pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po ste /
T02D1349:21b-1: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das brjod par bya ba dang /
T02D1349:21b-2: rjod par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:21b-3: brjod par bya ba ni ji skad du /
T02D1349:21b-4: dkyil 'khor bcu rnams gcig tu byed //
T02D1349:21b-5: gcig tu byas pa'i phyir mi 'gro //
T02D1349:21b-6: phyir mi 'gro ba las sems nor bu dang padmar 'dzin /
T02D1349:21b-7: gzung ba gyen du drangs pa las dri ma med pa nyid thob pa'o zhes so //
T02D1349:21b-8: rdo rje'i tshig 'di gsal bar byed pa'i ngag kyang ji skad du /
T02D1349:21b-9: dkyil 'khor bcu po yang dag sbyor //
T02D1349:21b-10: mgo bor thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba'o //
T02D1349:21b-11: rdo rje thal mo 'di yi ming //
T02D1349:21b-12: gzhan pa phyag rgya'i rgyal dbang po //
T02D1349:21b-15: sor mo rnams ni phan tshun du //
T02D1349:21b-16: dkyil 'khor bcu po yang dag sbyor //
T02D1349:21b-17: spyi bor lag pa'i mthil sbyar ngag / rtse gcig de ni gri gug go //
T02D1349:21b-19: 'o na gang dus kyi 'khor lor de kho na
T02D1349:21b-20: stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i bdag nyid do zhes
T02D1349:21b-21: pa de'i phyir ming gnyis dag gi dngos po gcig
T02D1349:21b-22: rtogs par byed pa'i phyir na /
T02D1349:21b-23: stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1349:21b-24: zhes zlos pa 'di ci'i don du gsungs she na bden mod /
T02D1349:21b-25: dbugs dbyung ba dang 'jug pa'i rgyu /
T02D1349:21b-26: mtshan mo dang nyin mo la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1349:21b-27: can sems can rnams kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa'i
T02D1349:21b-28: rgyur gyur pa gzhan yang dus kyi 'khor lo ste
T02D1349:21b-29: // de yang mu stegs pa rnams kyis rtag pa

T02D1349:21b-32: 'gyur zhe na gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das dus

T02D1349:21b-35: mo la sogs pa 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid can skye

T02D1349:22a-0: gyi skye ba dang 'jig pa med pa @22a *

T02D1349:22a-48: phra rab rdul rnams bral ba min //
T02D1349:22b-0: thams @22b cad tshe na mi rtag 'gyur //
T02D1349:22b-1: dngos po rtag tu mi rtag min //
T02D1349:22b-2: phra rab rdul chas phye ba las //
T02D1349:22b-3: yan lag yod dang yan lag med //
T02D1349:22b-4: ces pa phyogs yongs 'dzin pa las //
T02D1349:22b-5: rnam par shes dang tshangs smra ba'i //
T02D1349:22b-6: g-yo can rnams kyis 'chad par byed //
T02D1349:22b-7: bde gshegs rgyal ba'i tshul la phyogs //
T02D1349:22b-8: gnyis spangs de rnams bsngags par 'os //
T02D1349:22b-9: rtag dang mi rtag 'dzin spangs pa //
T02D1349:22b-10: bden gnyis tshul la gnas pa rnams //
T02D1349:22b-11: bden pa gnyis la brtan byas nas //
T02D1349:22b-12: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa //
T02D1349:22b-13: slob dpon gang rnams byed de rnams //
T02D1349:22b-14: sangs rgyas pa gzhan mu stegs can zhes so //
T02D1349:22b-15: de'i phyir stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i bdag nyid
T02D1349:22b-16: rnam par dag pa'i sems zhes bya ba dang ldan
T02D1349:22b-17: pa'o // de gzugs kyi mtshan nyid can ma yin te /
T02D1349:22b-18: rdul phra rab yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1349:22b-19: gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyid can ma yin te stong pa la yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1349:22b-20: rtag pa dang chad pa las grol ba yang bcom
T02D1349:22b-21: ldan 'das shes pa dang shes bya gcig pa'i sku
T02D1349:22b-23: de ltar rnam par shes pa'i sgrib pa rnam par
T02D1349:22b-24: dag pas stong pa chen po yi ge lnga'i rdo
T02D1349:22b-25: rje'i stong pa dang po rnam par shes pa 'gog
T02D1349:22b-26: pa'i mtshan nyid can de rnam par shes pa'i chos
T02D1349:22b-27: nyid las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T02D1349:22b-28: de rnam par shes pa gzhan no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1349:22b-29: de'i rigs su skyes pa nam mkha' la sogs pa'i
T02D1349:22b-30: khams dang dbang po rnams kyi yang 'das pa nyid
T02D1349:22b-31: do zhes so // de'i phyir thams cad nye bar
T02D1349:22b-32: 'dus pa'i rnam par shes par bya ba med pa
T02D1349:22b-33: do zhes so // kho na'o // de'i phyir yi
T02D1349:22b-34: ge so so'i ming gis sku bzhi'i bdag nyid can
T02D1349:22b-35: phyag gi 'os mchog rab bla ma gsal ba kho
T02D1349:22b-36: do zhes so // kho na'o // ba'o // gang gsung bar 'gyur ba /
T02D1349:22b-37: k'a sogs yi ge rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis //

T02D1349:22b-39: longs spyod rdzogs pa bzang po'i chos dang dag pa ste //

T02D1349:23a-1: khams dang dbang po rnams sgrib pa med pa nyid las stong pa gnyis pa'i bstod pa gsungs pa /
T02D1349:23a-2: rnam par bcas kyang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

T02D1349:23a-6: zhes pa'o // shes rab ma ni gang stong pa nyid do //
T02D1349:23a-7: bcom ldan 'das ma zhes pa bha ga ni chos kyi dbyings te /
T02D1349:23a-8: thams cad du 'gro yang de kho na nyid ma
T02D1349:23a-9: rig pa rnams kyis blta bar bya ba ma yin
T02D1349:23a-10: pa dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa gang la yod pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:23a-11: ji skad du phyag rgya chen po'i thig ler //
T02D1349:23a-12: ji ltar til son til mar dang //
T02D1349:23a-13: ji ltar shing la son pa'i me //
T02D1349:23a-14: de bzhin chos rnams thams cad la //
T02D1349:23a-15: yang dag gnas kyang mi mthong ba //
T02D1349:23a-16: chos kyi dbyings ni bha gar bshad //
T02D1349:23a-17: bha ga rin chen za ma tog / gang phyir dbang phyug sogs yon tan //
T02D1349:23a-18: ldan pa de phyir bha gar bshad //
T02D1349:23a-20: ci'i mtshan nyid can zhe na /
T02D1349:23a-22: rnam par bcas kyang rnam med do //
T02D1349:23a-23: rnam pa ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ste /
T02D1349:23a-24: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i don mthong ba'i phyir rgya che ba dang /
T02D1349:23a-25: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i don med pa'i phyir zab pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1349:23a-27: dngos dang dngos po med pa dang //
T02D1349:23a-28: gdod nas grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs //

T02D1349:29b-38: dang thabs kyi bdag nyid rnam par dag pa'i rnal
T02D1349:29b-39: 'byor zhes pa'o // mtshan ma ni sangs rgyas so
T02D1349:29b-40: byang chub bo zhes pa la sogs pa'i rnam par
T02D1349:29b-42: stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rgyu med pa de'i
T02D1349:29b-43: phyir gang la mtshan ma med pa de mtshan ma
T02D1349:30a-0: med pa'i ye shes dang mtshan ma med pa'i @30a
T02D1349:30a-2: des yang dag par dag pa gnyid mthug po zad
T02D1349:30a-3: pa las gnyis med de rtag pa dang mi rtag
T02D1349:30a-4: pa la sogs pa gnyis dang bral ba byams pa'i
T02D1349:30a-5: bdag nyid 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa rnam par rtog
T02D1349:30a-6: pa med pa gcig tu sems zhes pa thugs rdo
T02D1349:30a-7: rje'o // de kho na chos kyi sku shes rab
T02D1349:30a-8: dang thabs kyi bdag nyid chos kyi rnal 'byor zhes
T02D1349:30a-9: rje'o // brjod do // mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi phyir rtog pa med pa'i phyir /
T02D1349:30a-10: smon pa ste smon lam bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur
T02D1349:30a-11: bar bya'o zhes pa la sogs pa gang la med
T02D1349:30a-12: pa de smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar ba
T02D1349:30a-13: ste / des dag pa rmi lam zad pa'i phyir /
T02D1349:30a-14: mi zad pa ste gzhom du med pa'i sgra sems
T02D1349:30a-15: can thams cad kyi skad kyi bdag nyid kyi bde
T02D1349:30a-16: ba'i sngags dga' ba'i mtshan nyid can te sems can
T02D1349:30a-17: thams cad kyi skad rnams kyis sems can rnams dga'
T02D1349:30a-18: bar mdzad pa'i phyir dang yid skyo bar gyur pa
T02D1349:30a-19: nyid kyi phyir la tha snyad tsam gyi bdag nyid
T02D1349:30a-21: de ni nyi tshe ba nyid kyi phyir nang yul chung ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa ste /
T02D1349:30a-22: ngag rnams kyi gsung rdo rje'o //
T02D1349:30a-23: de kho na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku shes rab
T02D1349:30a-24: dang thabs kyi bdag nyid gsang sngags kyi rnal 'byor
T02D1349:30a-25: zhes pa'o // smon pa med pa'i phyir gang la
T02D1349:30a-26: dkar po dang dmar po dang srog dang thur sel
T02D1349:30a-27: dang rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can mngon par
T02D1349:30a-29: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i rnam par thar pa ste /
T02D1349:30a-30: des dag ba sad pa'i gnas skabs zad pa las rdzu 'phrul bgrod pa ste /
T02D1349:30a-31: rdzu 'phrul te nam mkhar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1349:30a-32: mtshan nyid can gyis 'gro bar byed pa zhes pa
T02D1349:30a-33: ste / drag po nyams dang chags pa dang zhi
T02D1349:30a-34: ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dri ma
T02D1349:30a-35: med pa ste ma 'dres pa'i btang snyoms kyi bdag
T02D1349:30a-36: ste / nyid do // 'o na 'di dri ma med pa nyid du mi rigs te /
T02D1349:30a-37: drag po dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i gzugs mthong pa'i phyir ro zhen /
T02D1349:30a-38: bden te de yang sems can rnams kyi rang gi sems kyi snang ba la las te /
T02D1349:30a-40: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi sprul pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:30a-41: sku zhes pa sku rdo rje'o //
T02D1349:30a-42: de kho na sprul pa'i sku zhes rab dang thabs
T02D1349:30b-0: kyi bdag nyid dbyibs @30b kyi rnal 'byor zhes pa'o
T02D1349:30b-1: // dbyibs zhes pa rnam dbye med pa'i tshig go //
T02D1349:30b-2: de yang thogs pa med pa mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar ba'o //
T02D1349:30b-3: 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mtshan la sogs bas brgyan par 'gyur mod /
T02D1349:30b-4: thogs pa med par ni ji ltar te /
T02D1349:30b-5: gang gi phyir lhas byin gyis sgyogs 'phangs pa'i rdo
T02D1349:30b-6: bas mngon par snang pa las bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D1349:30b-7: zhabs kyi mthe bong la tshor ba skyed pa nyid
T02D1349:30b-9: 'di ni sprul pa'i sku ma yin gyi 'on kyang sprul pa'i sprul pa ste /
T02D1349:30b-10: 'di yang tshor ba ni las kyi mthu phul du
T02D1349:30b-11: byung ba bshad pa'i don du bstan pa nyid do
T02D1349:30b-12: // de'i phyir sprul ba'i sku ni thogs pa dang bcas pa ma yin te /
T02D1349:30b-13: gang gi phyir gzugs kyi phung po 'gag pa'i phyir 'di mi srid do //
T02D1349:30b-14: gang le'ur 'di nyid du gsung bar 'gyur ba /
T02D1349:30b-15: de kho na lhan cig skyes pa'i sku stong pa
T02D1349:30b-16: nyid kyi rnam par thar pas rnam par dag pa
T02D1349:30b-17: ye shes kyi rdo rje kun mkhyen pa shes rab
T02D1349:30b-18: dang thabs kyi bdag nyid rnam par dag pa'i rnal
T02D1349:30b-19: 'byor zhes pa'o // de kho na chos kyi sku
T02D1349:30b-20: mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par
T02D1349:30b-21: dag pa thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi sku shes
T02D1349:30b-22: rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi chos kyi bdag
T02D1349:30b-23: nyid kyi rnal 'byor zhes brjod do //
T02D1349:30b-24: de kho na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku smon pa
T02D1349:30b-25: med pa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par dag pa
T02D1349:30b-26: gsung rdo rje nyin mor byed pa'i sku shes rab
T02D1349:30b-27: dang thabs kyi bdag nyid sngags kyi rnal 'byor zhes
T02D1349:30b-28: bshad do // de kho na sprul ba'i sku mngon
T02D1349:30b-29: par 'dus ma byas pa'i rnam par thar bas rnam
T02D1349:30b-30: par dag pa sku rdo rje padma'i 'dab ma rgyas
T02D1349:30b-31: pa'i spyan shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid dbyibs
T02D1349:30b-32: kyi rnal 'byor zhes brjod do zhes so //
T02D1349:30b-33: 'o na 'gyur ba med pa snying rjer 'gyur mod /
T02D1349:30b-34: snying rje dang ye shes 'gyur ba med pa zhes pa'i gsungs las te /
T02D1349:30b-35: gnyis su med ba dang mi zad ba dang dri
T02D1349:30b-36: ma med pa rnams kyi byams pa dang dga' ba
T02D1349:30b-37: dang btang snyoms shes pa 'di ltar zhe na bden
T02D1349:30b-38: mod / chos thams cad rnam par brtags pa las dang sgrib pa med pa nyid las /
T02D1349:30b-39: rnam par thar ba dang gnas pa bzhi gcig tu
T02D1349:30b-40: 'dres par gyur pa gnyis su med pa gsal bar
T02D1349:30b-41: byas te / ji skad du stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med //
T02D1349:30b-42: de bzhin smon pa med dang slar //
T02D1349:30b-43: mngon par 'dus ma byas de rnams //
T02D1349:31a-1: par thar pa bzhi ru bsgrags //
T02D1349:31a-2: snying rje de bzhin byams pa dang //
T02D1349:31a-3: dga' dang de bzhin btang snyoms te //
T02D1349:31a-4: de rnams tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi ste //
T02D1349:31a-5: chos kun yongs su btags pa las //
T02D1349:31a-6: sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyis ni //
T02D1349:31a-7: de yi gnyis med brtags pa'o //
T02D1349:31a-9: gnyis su med pa ni tshig gsum po rnams kyis kyang ngo zhes ba'o //
T02D1349:31a-10: bsgrub par bya ba'i sku bzhi rnams kyi sgrub pa po yang sems dpa' rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D1349:31a-12: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa ste /
T02D1349:31a-13: rdo rje ni mi phyed pa ste /
T02D1349:31a-14: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid ces pa'o //
T02D1349:31a-15: sems dpa' ni srid pa gsum la gcig pa nyid ces pa ste shes bya'o //
T02D1349:31a-16: 'di dag gcig pa nyid mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1349:31a-17: chen po'i sgras 'dir mchog tu mi 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1349:31a-18: de sa dang sa rnams kyis kyang rdzogs pa'i sems dpa' gang yin pa de sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02D1349:31a-19: byang chub stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i bdag nyid
T02D1349:31a-20: la rnam par gnas pa'i sems dpa' ni byang chub
T02D1349:31a-21: sems dpa'o // dam tshig ni byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1349:31a-22: de 'dzag pa med pa sems dpa'i sgras brjod do zhes bya ba dam tshig sems dpa'o //
T02D1349:31a-23: sems dpa' bzhi po 'di rnams kyang rtsa ba'i rgyud du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ;
T02D1349:31a-25: rdo rje mi phyed ces par bshad //
T02D1349:31a-27: sems dpa' srid pa gsum gcig nyid //
T02D1349:31a-28: mchog tu mi 'gyur bar brjod bya //
T02D1349:31a-29: de bzhin mchog tu mi 'gyur rdzogs //
T02D1349:31a-30: sa rnams kyis ni yongs rdzogs pa //
T02D1349:31a-31: 'dod chags chen po sems dpa' che //
T02D1349:31a-32: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //
T02D1349:31a-33: byang chub la gnas sems dpa' ni //
T02D1349:31a-34: byang chub sems dpa' mi g-yo nges //
T02D1349:31a-35: nyon mongs la sogs zhe sdang tshogs //
T02D1349:31a-36: zhe sdang chen po sgra che ba //
T02D1349:31a-37: dam tshig bdud rtsi khu ba ste //
T02D1349:31a-38: de yi 'dzag med za ba ni //
T02D1349:31a-39: dam tshig sems dpa' tshul 'di yis //
T02D1349:31a-40: gti mug blo yis gti mug sel //
T02D1349:31a-42: sgrub pa po bzhi po 'di rnams kyi yang snying
T02D1349:31a-43: po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes 'gyur ba med
T02D1349:31a-44: pa zhes bya ba sgrub par byed par bshad de
T02D1349:31a-46: de ltar sems dpa' rnam pa bzhi //
T02D1349:31a-47: sku rnams kyis ni sgrub po mchog / bzhi po rnams kyi snying po gang //
T02D1349:31b-0: stong @31b nyid ye shes mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1349:31b-2: byang chub kyi sems sngar brjod pa de kho na
T02D1349:31b-3: khyab bdag ste khyab par byed pa'o zhes de bzhin
T02D1349:31b-4: gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs te /
T02D1349:31b-5: ji ltar byon pa de ltar gshegs pa ste //
T02D1349:31b-7: rtsa ba'i rgyud du 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis gtsug tor nas //
T02D1349:31b-9: gsang las 'gyur med bde bas kyang //
T02D1349:31b-10: gtsug tor padmar de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1349:31b-12: de yang dngos dang dngos med zad pa ste /
T02D1349:31b-13: rtag pa dang chad pa las nges par grol ba'o //
T02D1349:31b-14: thog ma tha ma med ces thog ma skye ba
T02D1349:31b-15: dang tha ma 'chi ba ste de dag gang la
T02D1349:31b-17: de nyid kyi phyir rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir zhi ba zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:31b-18: de ltar rdul phra rab kyi chos nyid las 'das
T02D1349:31b-19: pa me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes
T02D1349:31b-20: lnga'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor gyis rtogs par bya ba
T02D1349:31b-21: stong pa chen po yi ge lnga pa brten pa
T02D1349:31b-22: byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba thams cad pa dus
T02D1349:31b-23: gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi spyod pa las grol ba
T02D1349:31b-24: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba zab cing rgya che ba'i
T02D1349:31b-25: ngo bo rdo rjer rgyal ba rnams kyis gang gsungs
T02D1349:31b-26: pa de kho na rgya cher 'grel pa mdzad pa
T02D1349:31b-27: ste / de dang 'di kho na mi phyed ces
T02D1349:31b-28: pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi tshig rnams kyis
T02D1349:31b-29: phyag rgya chen po thig ler mngon par gsal bar
T02D1349:31b-30: ste / byas te / mi phyed rdo rje zhes bshad pa //
T02D1349:31b-31: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid mchog / nam mkha' lnga yi nang thim pa //
T02D1349:31b-32: rang nyid nam mkha' lnga lta bu //
T02D1349:31b-33: padma'i snying po'i dbus gnas pa //
T02D1349:31b-34: thig ler zhes bya bgrod pa spangs //
T02D1349:31b-35: 'jig rten pa min kun dga' byed //
T02D1349:31b-36: mchog gi bdud rtsi khyad 'phags pa //
T02D1349:31b-37: rnam pa kun ldan rnam med pa //
T02D1349:31b-38: de ni rdo rjer yongs su bsgrags //
T02D1349:31b-40: dpal ldan dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgyud la
T02D1349:31b-41: 'jug pa'i bshad sbyar mi g-yo ba'i snying po snang
T02D1349:31b-42: bar rdo rje la phyag 'tshal ba'i nges pa ste
T02D1349:31b-44: / da ni ye shes 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid can
T02D1349:31b-45: te ye shes gzhan no zhes pa'i gsung las ye
T02D1349:31b-46: shes kyi khams dbang po rnams dang de'i rigs can
T02D1349:31b-47: rnams kyang sgrib pa med pa nyid ces pa thig
T02D1349:31b-48: le stong pa drug pa yi ge drug dang rigs
T02D1349:31b-49: drug rnams gcig pa thig le'i khams chos thams cad
T02D1349:32a-1: thabs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnam bzhi'i bdag nyid sku
T02D1349:32a-2: bzhi dang rnam pa bcu drug gcig tu 'dres par
T02D1349:32a-3: gyur pa / sad pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs
T02D1349:32a-4: 'gog pa'i chos can rdo rje bzhi po sgrib pa
T02D1349:32a-5: dang bral ba kun du rtog pa thams cad dang
T02D1349:32a-6: bral ba phyag rgya chen po las yang dag par
T02D1349:32a-7: skyes pa ae wam gi yi ge lhan cig skyes
T02D1349:32a-8: pa rdo rje 'dzin pa la tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1349:32a-9: drug gis bstod pa gsungs pa /
T02D1349:32a-10: sprul pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:32a-11: lhan cig skyes pa gcig tu de kho na sku
T02D1349:32a-12: bzhi dang dga' ba bzhi sgrib pa med pa'i sbyor
T02D1349:32a-13: ba las rnam pa bcu drug ste ji skad du
T02D1349:32a-14: / sku'i dga' ba 'gog pa las sprul pa'i sku
T02D1349:32a-15: ste ji srid du ye shes kyi lhan cig skyes
T02D1349:32a-16: pa'i ye shes kyi bar du'o //
T02D1349:32a-18: sbyor ba ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1349:32a-19: de'i sdom pa ni 'dus pa sprul pa la sogs
T02D1349:32a-20: pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rnams
T02D1349:32a-21: kyi'o zhes pa'o // 'o na sku bzhi rnams ni
T02D1349:32a-22: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa rang gzhan gyi
T02D1349:32a-23: don phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid can shin tu
T02D1349:32a-25: de ltar na sgyu ma lta bu'i dbyibs kyi bdag
T02D1349:32a-26: nyid sprul pa'i skus mtha' yas pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis
T02D1349:32a-28: 'dun par byas pa'i sems can rnams la rang rang
T02D1349:32a-29: gi mos pa las sna tshogs pa'i skad kyis bdag
T02D1349:32a-30: nyid la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus chos ston to
T02D1349:32a-31: // chos bstan pa'i sems can rnams kyi phung po
T02D1349:32a-32: drug gi bdag nyid kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
T02D1349:32a-33: chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi mtshan nyid can chos
T02D1349:32a-34: kyi sku dngos po dang dngos po med pa la
T02D1349:32a-36: rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi dri ma sbyor
T02D1349:32a-37: bar byed pa rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi
T02D1349:32a-38: dri ma dag pa rnams kyang lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D1349:32a-39: sku mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba ni mtshan
T02D1349:32a-40: nyid can sems can dang thun mong ma yin pa
T02D1349:32a-41: 'bras bu'i ngo bo thob par byed pa nyid yang
T02D1349:32a-42: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon du byed pa
T02D1349:32a-43: zhes pas sku bzhi la brten mod //
T02D1349:32a-44: rnam pa bcu drug so sor snang ba ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1349:32a-45: bden mod kun 'byung gi bden pa la brten nas brjod pa ste /
T02D1349:32a-46: gang na gcig yod pa der bzhi rnam so zhes pas skyon med do //
T02D1349:32a-47: ye shes kyi le'ur gsungs pa /
T02D1349:32b-0: 'dod pa sprul pa'i skur ni @32b nges par rab tu 'gyur te /
T02D1349:32b-1: gang bdag ni de yi gsung nyid do //
T02D1349:32b-2: 'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te 'di ni mchog gi
T02D1349:32b-3: bde ba byed pa'i ye shes dag ni aodd'a nyid
T02D1349:32b-4: // dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog
T02D1349:32b-5: dga' dang bcas khyad par dga' ba'i rim pa 'di
T02D1349:32b-6: // yis ni // gsung dang thugs so lhan cig
T02D1349:32b-7: skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid ni bde 'byung 'di yis
T02D1349:32b-9: 'dar ba nyid ni srid pa gsum gyis btud pa
T02D1349:32b-10: chos kyi sku ste 'byung ba de yi gsung du
T02D1349:32b-11: 'gyur // gnyid yur nyid ni chos kyi thugs te
T02D1349:32b-12: gnyid ni 'di nyid kho na'i ye shes srid pa'i
T02D1349:32b-14: dag pa'i sku ste rang bzhin phan pa'i cha dang
T02D1349:32b-15: thig le n'a da rim pa yis //
T02D1349:32b-16: bde 'byung dag pa'i sku yi gsung dang thugs dang
T02D1349:32b-17: ye shes rdo rje rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'o
T02D1349:32b-19: phyag rgya chen po thig ler yang //
T02D1349:32b-20: sku dang dga' ba 'dar ba dang //
T02D1349:32b-21: zhu dang kun dga' de bzhin no //
T02D1349:32b-22: zhes ni rnal 'byor dang po ste //
T02D1349:32b-24: gang ba dga' ba de bzhin du //
T02D1349:32b-25: brtan nyid 'byung ba mchog de bzhin //
T02D1349:32b-27: mchog tu dga' ba'i nges pa'o //
T02D1349:32b-28: 'bar dang dga' ba thig le dang //
T02D1349:32b-29: gnyid yur zhes khyad par de bzhin //
T02D1349:32b-31: khyad par dga' ba'i nges pa'o ;
T02D1349:32b-32: / aodd'a dga' ba n'a da dang //
T02D1349:32b-33: rang bzhin lhan skyes de bzhin no //
T02D1349:32b-35: lhan skyes zhes pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1349:32b-36: dga' ba bcu drug bye brag gis //
T02D1349:32b-37: bzhi po gsal bar byed pa nyid //
T02D1349:32b-38: de phyir thig le rim pas 'di'i //
T02D1349:32b-39: gtso bor thams cad slar yang nges ;
T02D1349:32b-40: /'dod pa dga' ba der rnams shes //
T02D1349:32b-41: ro ni gang phyir shes rab skyes //
T02D1349:32b-42: de phyir rang gi yid kyang ni //
T02D1349:32b-44: gang tshe bcom ldan shes rab ma //
T02D1349:32b-45: chags pa chen pos gang ba nyid //
T02D1349:32b-46: thob pa de tshe rang nyid ni //
T02D1349:32b-47: dbyer med gang ba las mchog go //
T02D1349:32b-48: de phyir rtag ba yang dag par //
T02D1349:32b-49: phyi bcas nang ni yun ring bar //
T02D1349:32b-50: 'bar bar byed pa mchog dga' ste //
T02D1349:32b-51: de tshe spyi bo nas 'ju ba'o //
T02D1349:32b-53: khyad par dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do //

T02D1349:36a-5: bcas pa'i stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid dri za'i

T02D1349:36a-7: bzhin can rten ye shes zhes pa'o //

T02D1349:36a-12: zhes pa'o // de ae pram gi yi ge'i bdag

T02D1349:36a-42: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sdom pa ni //

T02D1349:36b-17: pa thams cad yongs su gyur pa'i sems ni dri

T02D1349:36b-29: sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed mdzad ma //

T02D1349:42a-19: dpal ldan dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgyud la
T02D1349:42a-20: 'jug pa'i bshad sbyar mi g-yo ba'i snying po snang
T02D1349:42a-21: ba brgya phrag bcu gsum par rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D1349:42a-22: la phyag 'tshal ba'i nges pa ste gnyis pa'o /
T02D1349:42a-24: // / da ni byang chub sems dpas mdzad pa'i rgya
T02D1349:42a-25: cher 'grel mnyan pa'i rim pas bdag nyid chen po
T02D1349:42a-27: thos nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:42a-28: rgyas 'grel ni byang chub sems dpas mdzad pa ste /
T02D1349:42a-29: de ni mngon shes thob rnams kyis //
T02D1349:42a-30: bya yis mkhas rnams kyis min nyid //
T02D1349:42a-32: gtso bo'i ste brjod par bya ba dus kyi 'khor lo yi'o //
T02D1349:42a-33: rnal 'byor pa zhes pa rnal 'byor la ngang tshul 'di yod pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:42a-34: kyang gi sgra ni 'dir bsdu ba la ste /
T02D1349:42a-35: gzhan byis pa'i mkhas pa khyim gnas la sogs pa
T02D1349:42a-36: 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi rnal 'byor pas kyang
T02D1349:42a-37: ste yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi lam du ba
T02D1349:42a-38: la sogs pa'i lam la gnas pas so //
T02D1349:42a-39: ci byas nas she na rgyal bas gsungs pa'i cho
T02D1349:42a-40: gas te dbang gi le'ur gsungs pa'i rim pas dbang
T02D1349:42a-41: mchog ste shes rab ye shes blangs nas so //
T02D1349:42a-42: rgyud 'di thos nas te nyung du'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'o //
T02D1349:42a-43: de nas khengs pa rnam pa du ma dang longs spyod rnam par 'jig tu btang nas so //
T02D1349:42a-44: bi bha ba ni 'dir rnam par 'jig pa la
T02D1349:42a-45: ste sems kyi khyad par la ni phun sum tshogs
T02D1349:42b-0: pa'o // @42b sems ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi ched du gtad de bskyed pa'o //
T02D1349:42b-1: bla ma las zhes pa rdo rje slob dpon brtag
T02D1349:42b-2: pa'i cho gas brtags pa'i bla ma'i skabs las so
T02D1349:42b-3: // rnam pa gzhan du na brtag pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1349:42b-4: dang bral ba'i bla ma mnyes par byas pas slob
T02D1349:42b-5: ma rnams kyi chos la bzlog par 'gyur ro //
T02D1349:42b-6: chos las bzlogs [?] las dmyal bar 'gro'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:42b-7: 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te ma 'ongs pa'i dus
T02D1349:42b-8: su byis pa'i mkhas pa shes pa ngan pas khengs
T02D1349:42b-9: pa rnams mkhas pas mngon pa'i nga rgyal bskyed par
T02D1349:42b-10: 'gyur ro // mngon pa'i nga rgyal des dbang ma
T02D1349:42b-11: blangs shing rgyud ma thos pa'o nas 'grel pa ma
T02D1349:42b-12: bsams nas slob dpon ma bsten pa rgyud kyi don
T02D1349:42b-13: dang dbang gi don mi shes pa rnams bdud kyi
T02D1349:42b-14: ris rnams bzhin du sems can rnams kyi bla mar
T02D1349:42b-15: gyur nas phyin ci log tu ston par gyur to
T02D1349:42b-16: 'gyur ro // // gzhan gyi bud med dang rdzas
T02D1349:42b-17: rnyed pas dmyal bar 'gro ba la spro ba rnams
T02D1349:42b-19: 'di dgag pa lhur len pa tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:42b-20: 'o na de lta na mngon par shes pa med
T02D1349:42b-21: pa rnams kyis rgya cher 'grel byed na 'dir skyon
T02D1349:42b-22: ci yod / gang gis na 'di brjod par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1349:42b-23: gang zhes pa la sogs pa'o ;
T02D1349:42b-24: / gang mngon par shes pa med par rgya cher 'grel pa chen po ste /
T02D1349:42b-25: don thams cad mtshon par byed pa rgyas bshad chen
T02D1349:42b-26: po dang mdor bstan pa chen po'i mtshan nyid can
T02D1349:42b-27: byed pa'o // dpal ldan rdo rje theg par zhes
T02D1349:42b-28: pa dpal gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis nye
T02D1349:42b-29: bar mtshan pa rdo rje theg par 'gro ba'o //
T02D1349:42b-30: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa de la gnas pa ste zhon pa'o //
T02D1349:42b-31: bstan bcos du ma'i rnam rtog chos kyi snying zhes
T02D1349:42b-32: pa ni bstan bcos te rtog ge la sogs pa
T02D1349:42b-33: rnams kyis dbugs phyung ba'i rnam par rtog pa ste
T02D1349:42b-34: mi bden pa'i shes pa yang nga //
T02D1349:42b-35: de kho na chos te rang gi ngo bo'i don
T02D1349:42b-36: nye bar ston pa'i chu la yun ring por zhugs
T02D1349:42b-37: pa'i gdengs can gyi rkang pa lta bu'i snying rje
T02D1349:42b-38: sems gang gi yin pa zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:42b-39: da ni glang chen long ba'i rgyud ltar rang gi rgyud nyams par byad pa'o //
T02D1349:42b-40: de'i rgyud ni yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung stobs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1349:43a-1: bstan pa ste dgra'i rgyud rgyal ba'i ched du'o //
T02D1349:43a-2: gsod par byed pas na bdud de de'i gnyen ni pha dang ma'i 'brel par gyur pa'o //
T02D1349:43a-3: rtag tu ni dus thams cad du'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:43a-5: rgya cher 'grel byed pa po mngon par shes pa
T02D1349:43a-6: dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir long ba lta bu
T02D1349:43a-7: bden pa mthong ba dang bral ba bstan bcos du
T02D1349:43a-8: ma'i rnam rtog chos kyi snying can nyid kyi phyir
T02D1349:43a-9: glang po che bzhin du bzlog pa la bzlog pa'i
T02D1349:43a-10: lus can mkhas pa nyid kyis dregs pa dang ldan
T02D1349:43a-11: pa nyid kyi phyir myos pa bzhin du nga rgyal
T02D1349:43a-12: chen pos khengs pa las bdud kyi phyogs su gyur
T02D1349:43a-13: pa ni / 'gyur ba'i bde ba la sogs pa
T02D1349:43a-14: bdud kyi stobs rgyal ba'i ched du gang gnas pa'i
T02D1349:43a-15: rgyud mtha' drug gi mtshan nyid can dbang bzhi la
T02D1349:43a-16: sogs pa rjod par byed pa de rtsa ba dang
T02D1349:43a-17: bcas pa rtsad nas dbyung bar 'bad pa'i rmongs pa
T02D1349:43a-18: pa ni / chen po ste / de dgag pa'i ched du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so //
T02D1349:43a-19: 'o na 'di lta bu'i skyon rnam par smin pa'i
T02D1349:43a-20: 'bras bu rtsub pa can mthong nas kyang rgya cher
T02D1349:43a-21: 'grel byed pa la 'jug pa ni ci mkhas pa'i
T02D1349:43a-22: rang bzhin can du 'gyur ram zhes dgos pa la
T02D1349:43a-23: gsungs pa / mkhas pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:43a-24: mngon pa'i nga rgyal can ni mkhas par sems pa yin gyi //
T02D1349:43a-25: bden pa mthong ba ni ma yin pa'o //
T02D1349:43a-26: rgyal bdag gsung ni gang zhig thig le las ni
T02D1349:43a-27: dkar po'i rgyun 'bab ces pa la sogs pa rnams
T02D1349:43a-28: la dgongs pa gang gis mi shes pa'i dang tshul
T02D1349:43a-29: can de ni rgyal bdag gsung ni mi shes ngang
T02D1349:43a-30: tshul lo // 'gyod pa dang srog gcod pa la
T02D1349:43a-31: sogs pa mi dge ba'i lam can zhes pa la
T02D1349:43a-32: ngan pa'i bya ba ni ngan byas te gang bsod
T02D1349:43a-33: nams btang ba dang 'jig rten gyis smad pa'o //
T02D1349:43a-34: de'i dngos po ni 'gyod pa nyid do //
T02D1349:43a-35: srog gcod pa ni srog chags gsad pa'o //
T02D1349:43a-36: de dag kho na mi dge ba'i lam gyi dang po yin pa'o //
T02D1349:43a-37: sogs pa'i sgra las ma byin par len pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:43a-38: de la gnas pa zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D1349:43a-39: des na bud med bde bas sems drangs zhes pa
T02D1349:43a-40: dbang po gnyis kyis 'gyur ba'i bde bas gang gi
T02D1349:43a-41: sems drangs te dbang du byas pa zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:43a-42: 'o na chang gis kun dga' gcig ste bha ga
T02D1349:43b-0: nyed pa bu ni sgrub @43b pa'i ched du'o gzhan
T02D1349:43b-2: ces pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yin nam zhe na /
T02D1349:43b-3: bden mod sgra ji bzhin ma yin te /
T02D1349:43b-4: chang yang gzhan yin bha ga yang gzhan yin te /
T02D1349:43b-5: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi ched du gsungs pa'o //
T02D1349:43b-6: sgra ji bzhin pas kyang bde ba 'phel ba'i don du ste /
T02D1349:43b-7: bde ba nyams pa'i ched du ma yin no //
T02D1349:43b-8: 'di dpal ldan shes rab bde nyams shes pa ste dpal ldan shes rab ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1349:43b-9: de'i bde ba ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1349:43b-10: de las nyams pa ni ring du gyur pa'o //
T02D1349:43b-11: de las rdo rje'i tshig bcom ste /
T02D1349:43b-12: bzhi pa la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig bcom pa'o //
T02D1349:43b-13: de nyid kyi phyir phyi rol gyi longs spyod kyis
T02D1349:43b-14: zil gyis mnan pa ste dam pa ma yin pa'i
T02D1349:43b-15: bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa la chags
T02D1349:43b-16: pa'o // theg mchog ni rdo rje theg pa la'o //
T02D1349:43b-17: mngon par shes pa la sogs pa med par rgya
T02D1349:43b-18: cher 'grel pa byas nas long bas bdag nyid lhung
T02D1349:43b-19: nas long ba gzhan dmyal bar 'jug go //
T02D1349:43b-20: ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don te de'i
T02D1349:43b-21: phyir de ltar chos kyi yang dag pa'i ye shes
T02D1349:43b-22: kyi lam la gnas par spro ba ni ji ltar
T02D1349:43b-23: yang rang gi chos rjes su sgrub pa dang mthun
T02D1349:43b-24: pa'i lam bor nas 'tsho ba'i sdong po'i 'bras bu
T02D1349:43b-25: za bar byed pa de ltar ni shes rab 'chal
T02D1349:43b-26: ba'i rang bzhin can ni mkhas pa nyid du mngon
T02D1349:43b-27: pa'i nga rgyal bskyed nas de slar yang de bzhin
T02D1349:43b-28: du / khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya //
T02D1349:43b-29: zhes pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig phyin ci
T02D1349:43b-30: log tu ston par rang gis byas pa'i rgya cher
T02D1349:43b-31: 'grel pas bzung nas lam 'di ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1349:43b-32: kyis thar pa'i ched du gsungs pa'o zhes sems can
T02D1349:43b-33: rnams la rgya cher sgrogs par byed de gang las
T02D1349:43b-34: rang yang nyams shing gzhan yang nyams su 'jug pa
T02D1349:43b-35: rang nyid zab mo'i don mi shes pa la lam
T02D1349:43b-36: nyams pa bzhin du lam yin pa nye bar ston
T02D1349:43b-37: pa lam phyin ci log las bzlog par mi nus
T02D1349:43b-38: so zhes pa'o // gal te gzhan chos mtshungs pa
T02D1349:43b-39: ma yin pa rnams kyi dmyal bar 'gro bar mi
T02D1349:43b-40: rigs pa ma yin nam zhe na bdan [?] mod
T02D1349:43b-41: gang rnams des sbyar ba'i 'grel bshad las rdo rje'i
T02D1349:43b-42: tshig gi don phyin ci log tu thos shing shes
T02D1349:44a-1: rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don kun nas
T02D1349:44a-2: shes so zhes pa 'di ltar mngon pa'i nga rgyal
T02D1349:44a-3: skyed par byed pa de rnams kyang rgyal ba'i bdag
T02D1349:44a-4: po'i gsung mi shes pa'i ngang tshul can rtag tu
T02D1349:44a-5: longs par gyur pa rnams te /
T02D1349:44a-6: sngar kho nar dmyal bar 'gro ba rnams so zhes
T02D1349:44a-7: pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa rnams kyang dgag
T02D1349:44a-8: pa'i don du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so
T02D1349:44a-9: zhes pa'o // gal te de la mngon par shes
T02D1349:44a-10: pa med pa rnams kyis rgya cher 'grel mi bya
T02D1349:44a-11: la byas kyang ston pa po rnams kyis bstan par
T02D1349:44a-12: mi bya zhing de rnams kyang lam las phyin ci
T02D1349:44a-13: log pa dang brdzun du smra ba nyid gzung bar
T02D1349:44a-14: 'os pa ma yin pa'i tshig can rnams yin na
T02D1349:44a-15: rgya cher 'grel byed pa po phyin ci ma log
T02D1349:44a-16: pa bden pa mthong ba rnams ni su rnams yin
T02D1349:44a-18: ston pas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:44a-19: rang gi sgra'i rnam grangs la nyid kyi sgra yang
T02D1349:44a-20: yod de de'i phyir nyid de bdag nyid kyis de
T02D1349:44a-21: gzhan dang gzhan gyis ma yin pa'o //
T02D1349:44a-22: ston pas te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis so //
T02D1349:44a-23: rdo rje'i theg par te theg pa chen por ro //
T02D1349:44a-24: rgyal bdag bde ster te lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba sbyin pa por ro //
T02D1349:44a-25: gang rgyu cher 'grel ba nyid dang sdud par byed
T02D1349:44a-26: pa nyid du lung bstan pa bdag 'dra ste sa
T02D1349:44a-27: bcu'i dbang phyug 'jig rten dbang phyug lta bu de
T02D1349:44a-28: rnams thams cad ni sangs rgyas mthar thug ces pa
T02D1349:44a-29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag nyid chen
T02D1349:44a-30: po sgrogs so // lha dang lag 'gro mi rnam
T02D1349:44a-31: smin pa'i don du ste srid pa gsum gyi skye
T02D1349:44a-32: bo rnams kyi sangs rgyas nyid kyi ched du ste
T02D1349:44a-33: po sgrogs so // / tshig 'jam pos bslab pa'i
T02D1349:44a-34: gnas sbyin pa'i rim gyis sems shes nas dpe'i tshul
T02D1349:44a-35: gyis 'dod chags la sogs pa'i skyon rnams rnam par
T02D1349:44a-36: sel ba zhes pa ni smin pa'o //
T02D1349:44a-37: de nyid gang gi don te dgos pa yin pa'o //
T02D1349:44a-38: phyi nas dka' thub kyi bslab pa nas ji srid
T02D1349:44a-39: du don dang mthun pa bsgoms pas skyon rnams rtsa
T02D1349:44a-41: ji skad du nad pa rnams la dang por sman
T02D1349:44a-42: gyi sbyor ba phra mos smin par byed pa la
T02D1349:44a-43: phyi nas drag po'i rims la sogs pa'i skyon rnams
T02D1349:44a-44: nges par sgrol ba'o zhes so //
T02D1349:44b-0: gang rnams @44b mngon shes lnga rnams kyang med pa
T02D1349:44b-1: de rnams kyang rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i don du
T02D1349:44b-2: bdag cag rgyal dbang yin zhes bden pa min pa
T02D1349:44b-3: smra'o zhes pa de'i phyir de rnams kyi gang thar
T02D1349:44b-4: pa 'dod pa rnams kyis mnyan par mi bya dad
T02D1349:44b-5: par mi bya yin la mi bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:44b-6: gal te de lta na 'phags pa phyag na rdo
T02D1349:44b-7: rjes mdzad pa'i rgya cher 'grel par ji ltar gsungs
T02D1349:44b-8: te 'dir dang por bum pa'i dbang la slob ma
T02D1349:44b-9: rdo rje slob dpon du gyur pa'o //
T02D1349:44b-10: de bzhin du gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes dang bzhi pa la yang ngo //
T02D1349:44b-11: slob dpon nyid du gang zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1349:44b-12: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'o zhes so //
T02D1349:44b-13: de ji ltar yin te dang por bum pa'i dbang
T02D1349:44b-14: bskur gyis dbang bskur ba slob dpon no zhes pa'i
T02D1349:44b-15: gsung las rgyal ba'i dbang po nyid du rigs so
T02D1349:44b-16: zhe na de lta ma yin te dbang bskur bzhi'i
T02D1349:44b-17: rim pa rnam par gzhag pa'i don du'o //
T02D1349:44b-18: de yang kun rdzob tu ste dam pa'i don du ni ma yin no //
T02D1349:44b-19: ji skad du 'phags pa rdo rje snying pos mdzad pa'i rgya cher 'grel par gsungs pa /
T02D1349:44b-20: ji ltar bshad ba rnams snang dang //
T02D1349:44b-21: gci ba khu ba'i dam tshig ni //
T02D1349:44b-22: mi bskyod 'od dpag med yin pa //
T02D1349:44b-23: de bzhin slob dpon rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1349:44b-24: bshad gci khu ba phyag rgya rnams //
T02D1349:44b-25: ji ltar slob dpon sbyin pa po //
T02D1349:44b-26: de bzhin lus ngag yid rnams kyis //
T02D1349:44b-27: grub pa sbyin byed rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1349:44b-28: kun rdzob dang ni bzlog pas kyang //
T02D1349:44b-29: slob ma rnal 'byor rnams kyi yang //
T02D1349:44b-30: dkyil 'khor byang chub rtsa ba ru //
T02D1349:44b-31: gang de sngon la phyi ma min //
T02D1349:44b-32: dgongs pa'i skad ni mi shes shing //
T02D1349:44b-33: ming tsam gyis ni rmongs pa rnams //
T02D1349:44b-34: rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams spangs nas //
T02D1349:44b-37: de ltar byang chub sems dpas mdzad pa'i rgya cher
T02D1349:44b-38: 'grel pa la thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis gdams
T02D1349:44b-39: ngag rnam pas thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom
T02D1349:44b-40: pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchog tu mngon par
T02D1349:44b-42: 'o na de ltar gang gis 'di kho na la
T02D1349:44b-43: rab tu dang bar bya ba byang chub sems dpas
T02D1349:44b-44: mdzad pa'i rgya cher 'grel de la rnam par bgrangs
T02D1349:44b-45: pa'i yon tan ci zhig mthong zhe na gsungs pa
T02D1349:45a-0: sna tshogs zhes pa la sogs @45a * //
T02D1349:45a-2: / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi tshe na 'byung bar
T02D1349:45a-3: 'gyur te sangs rgyas pa rnams kyi blo ste shes
T02D1349:45a-4: pa sna tshogs te rnam pa du ma 'byung bar
T02D1349:45a-5: 'gyur te / rtog ge la sogs pa'i bstan bcos la gtad pa'o //
T02D1349:45a-6: sogs pa'i sgra chos mngon pa'i mdzod dang shes rab
T02D1349:45a-7: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i bstan
T02D1349:45a-8: bcos rnams te de rnams la so sor gnas pa'o
T02D1349:45a-9: // ji skad du nang gi le'ur gsungs pa /
T02D1349:45a-10: gang zhig de kho na nyid gang zag ces bya
T02D1349:45a-11: lung nas smra ba de ni rang bzhin gyis bdag
T02D1349:45a-12: nyams // kun rdzob tu ni don du smra ba
T02D1349:45a-13: po yang don dam ma rig med pa ru ni
T02D1349:45a-14: nyams // 'dod pa'o ; / srid gsum mtha' dag
T02D1349:45a-15: rnam par shes pa nyid du smra ba po yang
T02D1349:45a-16: rnam par shes par 'dod par byed //
T02D1349:45a-17: gang zhig stong nyid snying rje gnyis su med par
T02D1349:45a-18: smra po phyogs nyams de ni ma nyams par 'gyur
T02D1349:45a-20: sna tshogs su ma zad kyi log pa yang ste /
T02D1349:45a-21: log pa'i shes pa ni chad pa'i stong pa nyid kyi shes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:45a-22: gzhan gyi rtog ge la sogs pa dang 'grogs pa'i
T02D1349:45a-23: dbang las te gzhan rnam par shes pa tshangs par
T02D1349:45a-24: smra ba la sogs pa rnams kyi 'dod bya ma

T02D1349:48b-6: da ni lam don du gnyer ba rnams kyi don la rton pa nyid gsungs pa /
T02D1349:48b-7: sgra dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:48b-8: sgra ni legs pa'i sgra samya ka sam buddha la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:48b-9: sgra min ni sgra nyams pa lha dang klu'i brda
T02D1349:48b-10: sprod pa las phyi rol du gyur pas byas pa
T02D1349:48b-11: g'a bi zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:48b-12: de rnams rnam par dpyad pa las ni chen po
T02D1349:48b-13: ste khyad par can gyi don dang ldan pa med
T02D1349:48b-14: pa'o ; / sna tshogs yul skad ngan pa ni
T02D1349:48b-15: ai tya pi so bha ga b'an zhes pa la
T02D1349:48b-16: pa'o ; sogs pa'o // chen po rnams kyi ni
T02D1349:48b-17: phyag rgya chen po don du gnyer ba rnams kyi
T02D1349:48b-18: ste dbang po rnon po nyid kyi phyir ro zhes
T02D1349:48b-19: pa'o ; sogs pa'o // pa'o // thams cad mkhyen
T02D1349:48b-20: pa'i gsung de ni sna tshogs pa'i skad kyi bdag
T02D1349:48b-21: pa'o ; sogs pa'o // pa'o // nyid / mchog ste bla na med pa'i bde ba sbyin pa'o //
T02D1349:48b-22: sems can rnams kyi mos pa'i sems kyi dbang las
T02D1349:48b-23: te mngon par yid ches pa bstan pa'i gzhan gyi
T02D1349:48b-24: dbang las so // skad gzhan ni brda sprod pa la lha dang kla la sogs pas bkod pa'o //
T02D1349:48b-25: gang gis sgra rnams brda sprod par bya zhing ;
T02D1349:48b-26: gtan la dbab par bya ba de ni brda sprod
T02D1349:48b-27: pa ste sgra sogs rtsod pa don gnyer rnams kyi'o
T02D1349:48b-28: // sogs pa'i sgra las don dang 'brel ba dang /
T02D1349:48b-29: ngag dang rnam par dbye ba dang tshig dang yi
T02D1349:48b-30: ge la sogs pa gzung par bya'o zhes pa legs
T02D1349:48b-31: par sbyar ba'i skad ni nyi tshe ba nyid do
T02D1349:48b-32: zhas pa'o // 'o na sgra las don rtogs pa
T02D1349:48b-33: sgra nyams las ma yin pa ma yin nam zhen
T02D1349:48b-34: zhas pa'o // gsungs pa / sgra nyams pa las kyang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:48b-35: kyang gi sgra ni rim pa tha dad pa la
T02D1349:48b-36: ste sgra nyams pa las kyang rnal 'byor pa yis
T02D1349:48b-37: don ni 'dzin par byed de yul gyi skad las
T02D1349:48b-39: kar n'a da pa'i kar n'a'i sgras //
T02D1349:48b-40: rdo dang rkang pa brjod par byas //
T02D1349:48b-41: la lar 'on par rab brjod de //
T02D1349:48b-42: de bzhin rgyud rnams su bstan pa'o //
T02D1349:48b-44: zan gyi don rab rtogs par byed //
T02D1349:48b-45: la lar chom rkun pa nyid brjod //
T02D1349:48b-46: de bzhin rgyud du bstan pa rnams /
T02D1349:49a-1: / de bzhin du pu ru she ganda zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:49a-3: da ni tshig 'bru la rton pa dgag pa gsungs pa /
T02D1349:49a-4: dam pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:49a-5: dam pa ni 'jig rten gsum rnams su mchog go //
T02D1349:49a-6: don ni dgongs pa ste phyag rgya chen po'i lam mo //
T02D1349:49a-7: de'i de nyid ni mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes so //
T02D1349:49a-8: de'i yul ni rdo rje'i gnas te de la zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:49a-9: tshig 'bru ni 'dir sgra bzang po la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D1349:49a-11: da ni rnam par shes pa la rton pa nyid dgag pa gsungs pa /
T02D1349:49a-12: ye shes zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1349:49a-13: nyid kyi sgra gnyis kar yang sbrel bar bya'o //
T02D1349:49a-14: brjod par bya ba gang brjod pa ste /
T02D1349:49a-15: mngon par brjod par gyur pa na sgra dang sgra
T02D1349:49a-16: nyams par 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya ba nyid
T02D1349:49a-17: du nges par 'gyur ba de ye shes nyid ma
T02D1349:49a-19: de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung nyid du mi 'gyur te /
T02D1349:49a-20: de ni nyi tshe ba ste /
T02D1349:49a-21: nyi tshe la yod pa lha la sogs pas bkod pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:49a-22: da ni ye shes la rton pa nyid gsungs pa mchog tu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:49a-23: gang zhig shes rab ye shes dang //
T02D1349:49a-24: shes rab ni phyag rgya chen mo pra phab pa'i rang bzhin can yin la ;
T02D1349:49a-25: de nyid ye shes te dus gsum pa mthong ba'o //
T02D1349:49a-26: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ste ma lus pa'i ngo bo mthong ba rnams kyi'o //
T02D1349:49a-27: de nyid mchog tu mi 'gyur ba //
T02D1349:49a-28: bzhi pa'o de ni slar yang de bzhin te //
T02D1349:49a-29: rang gi phyag rgya chen po rgyal bas gsungs //
T02D1349:49a-31: mchog ni khams gsum pas mchod pa'o //
T02D1349:49a-32: mi 'gyur ba ni 'pho ba med pa'i bde ba'o //
T02D1349:49a-33: bzhi pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i thig le 'gog pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:49a-34: phyi nas khyad par gyi bsdu ba'o //
T02D1349:49a-35: de las rang gi phyag rgya chen po 'di rgyal bas gsungs te /
T02D1349:49a-36: 'dir rab tu gsal bar mdzad do //
T02D1349:49a-37: de yang de bzhin no zhes pa 'dis gzhan du
T02D1349:49a-38: rnal 'byor la gdug pa'i slob dpon gyi 'jigs pa
T02D1349:49a-39: las shes pa'o // 'o na shes rab ye shes
T02D1349:49a-40: kyi khyad par bzhi pa'am mchog tu mi 'gyur ba
T02D1349:49a-41: zhes pa gcig gis chog pa ma yin nam /
T02D1349:49b-0: gnyis kas don gcig rtogs par byed pa'i @49b phyir ro zhe na bden mod /
T02D1349:49b-2: gang rnams shes rab ye shes ni dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1349:49b-3: 'khor lo bsgom pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes rab
T02D1349:49b-4: kyi bde ba bzhi par sems shing de rnams phyag
T02D1349:49b-5: rgya chen po'i ye shes las nyams pa rnam par
T02D1349:49b-6: rtog pa yongs su mdor ba las dam pa ma
T02D1349:49b-7: yin pa'i bla ma'i gdams ngag las shes rab ye
T02D1349:49b-8: shes mi shes pa rnams 'gyur ba'i bde bas skyed
T02D1349:49b-9: pa'i 'dzag pa'i bde ba shes rab ye shes nyid
T02D1349:49b-10: du nye bar ston par 'gyur ro zhes pa dgag
T02D1349:49b-11: pa'i don du mchog tu mi 'gyur ba zhes pa'i
T02D1349:49b-13: gang rdo rje'i tshig shin tu mi shes pa rnams
T02D1349:49b-14: bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no zhes pa'i gsung
T02D1349:49b-15: las las kyi phyag rgya las skye bar 'gyur ba'i
T02D1349:49b-16: bde ba gsum pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu dbye
T02D1349:49b-17: ba med pa las shes rab ye shes su sems
T02D1349:49b-18: par byed de dbang po gnyis kyi bde bar mngon
T02D1349:49b-19: par 'dod pa slob dpon ma bsten pa mchog mi
T02D1349:49b-20: 'gyur ba'i bde ba nyams pa phyugs rnams las kyang
T02D1349:49b-21: phyugs te de rnams kyis 'gyur ba'i bde ba med
T02D1349:49b-22: par kun du bzang po shes rab ye shes nyams
T02D1349:49b-23: su myong bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa kho
T02D1349:49b-24: na bzhi pa nyid du 'jig rten rnams 'dzin du
T02D1349:49b-25: 'jug go zhes pa 'di'i don du bzhi pa zhes
T02D1349:49b-27: gal te yang las kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes
T02D1349:49b-28: kyi phyag rgya zhes pa las skyes pa'i 'gyur zhing
T02D1349:49b-29: 'dzag pa'i mtshan nyid can 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D1349:49b-30: ye shes su 'gyur na de'i tshe /
T02D1349:49b-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu 'phrul dra bar /
T02D1349:49b-32: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le 'chang //
T02D1349:49b-35: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i mtha' 'chang ba //
T02D1349:49b-36: zhes pa la sogs pa 'di gsungs pa 'di ci
T02D1349:49b-37: zhig / rgyud kyi rgyal por yang ye shes kyi
T02D1349:49b-38: le'ur / de ltar sems ni rnam bzhi srid pa
T02D1349:49b-39: gsum la gnas pa srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i
T02D1349:49b-40: le'ur / dbus su ste // rnal 'byor dbang po
T02D1349:49b-41: rnams kyis bde mnyam 'bras ster khyab par byed ni
T02D1349:49b-42: thar pa'i rgyu ru bsrung bar bya //
T02D1349:49b-43: thig le btang na rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye bo'i
T02D1349:49b-44: sa bon mchog gi bde ba song la thar pa
T02D1349:50a-0: gang // de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba'i skad cig 'di ni @50a * //
T02D1349:50a-1: sdom brtson rnams kyis thams cad dus su dor bar bya //
T02D1349:50a-3: de'i phyir shes rab kyi ye shes zhes kyang smra bar mi bya ste /
T02D1349:50a-4: 'der [*'dir?] gal te shas rab kyi ye shes 'pho
T02D1349:50a-5: ba'i mtshan nyid can shes rab kyi rgyu las skyes
T02D1349:50a-6: pa'i 'bras bu thabs kyi shes rab ye shes yin
T02D1349:50a-7: na de'i tshe thabs kyi rgyu las skyes pa'i 'bras
T02D1349:50a-8: bu ni shes rab kyi phyag rgya chen po'i dngos
T02D1349:50a-9: grub kyi don du thabs ye shes su 'gyur ro
T02D1349:50a-10: // de ltar na phan tshun ltos pa nyid kyi phyir ye shes gnyis dag tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1349:50a-11: de ltar gnyis ka'i ye shes so sor gyur na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes med do //
T02D1349:50a-12: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid kyang med par 'gyur te /
T02D1349:50a-13: rnam par dag pa mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye
T02D1349:50a-14: shes dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes so
T02D1349:50a-15: // cis te shes rab ye shes ni shes rab
T02D1349:50a-16: ye shes yin na de'i tshe thabs kyi ye shes
T02D1349:50a-17: thabs kyi ye shes so zhes pa ste skyon snga
T02D1349:50a-19: 'o na gsum pa 'gyur ba'i bde ba'i mtshan nyid can shes rab ye shes su mi 'gyur mod /
T02D1349:50a-20: rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur du chug mod /
T02D1349:50a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi dpe la 'gyur ba'i bde ba
T02D1349:50a-22: 'jig rten rjes su gzung ba'i don du gsungs pa
T02D1349:50a-25: kun rdzob tu dpe'i don du gsungs pa ste /
T02D1349:50a-26: bzlog pas ni 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes su mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:50a-27: 'di kho na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa
T02D1349:50a-28: dag gis 'phags pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis
T02D1349:50a-29: dper byas nas bstan par gsungs pa /
T02D1349:50a-30: zag ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:50a-31: gang gis dkar po ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1349:50a-32: ma rgyas pa ni kha ma bye ba'o //
T02D1349:50a-33: tsu ta'i 'bras bu rgyu ci yis 'byung ste gang gis kyang ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1349:50a-35: grub pa kun gyi gter gyur pa //
T02D1349:50a-36: byang chub sems ni lhung 'gyur ba //
T02D1349:50a-37: phung po rnam shes brgyal ba na //
T02D1349:50a-38: grub pa smad med ga la yin //
T02D1349:50a-40: da ltar bzhi pa'i gnas skabs kyi sgrib pa zad
T02D1349:50a-41: pa'i bdag nyid kyi rgyu med par byis pa'i rigs
T02D1349:50a-42: can las gzhan pa ni sangs rgyas nyid ces pa'i
T02D1349:50b-1: / gal te de ltar na skye bo thams cad
T02D1349:50b-2: nyid 'gyur ba'i bde ba re bar byed ce na
T02D1349:50b-4: gang gis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:50b-5: gang gis te srog chags kyis 'khor ba'i bde ba'i
T02D1349:50b-6: bag chags kyi sa bon gyis skyed pa 'du byed
T02D1349:50b-7: kyi sdug bsngal las te 'gyur ba'i bde ba la
T02D1349:50b-8: chags pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1349:50b-9: bya thams cad skom pa ni sa la gnas pa'i chu tshol bar byed la /
T02D1349:50b-10: ts'a ta ka ni btung bar sems pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:50b-12: gang ts'a ta ka'i spyod pa'i rjes su spyod pa
T02D1349:50b-13: de ni mkhas pa'i rigs can skye ba snga ma'i
T02D1349:50b-14: stong pa nyid dang snying rje kun rdzob pa'i dmigs
T02D1349:50b-15: pa med pa'i bag chags kyi stobs kyis rdul phra
T02D1349:50b-16: rab tshogs pa las 'das pa dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D1349:50b-17: lo la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa bsgom pa
T02D1349:50b-18: dang bral ba phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi
T02D1349:50b-19: sgrub byed la dmigs par bya ba ma yin pa
T02D1349:50b-20: mchog mi 'gyur pa'i bde ba mngon sum du bya
T02D1349:50b-21: ba'i ched du 'bad par byed de /
T02D1349:50b-22: rtag tu rang dang gzhan gyi don du gnyer ba'o //
T02D1349:50b-23: gang shes rab dman pa dbang po gnyis kyi bde
T02D1349:50b-24: ba mngon par 'dod pa las chags bral las skyes
T02D1349:50b-25: pa'i sdug bsngal kho na la mngon par rgyug go
T02D1349:50b-26: // de ni byis pa'i rigs can rang gi don
T02D1349:50b-27: nyams pa rang nyid kyang sdug bsngal ba yin na
T02D1349:50b-28: de'i gzhan gyi don ga la yin zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:50b-29: 'di kho na drang ba dang nges pa'i don dag gis gsungs pa /
T02D1349:50b-30: 'khor ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:50b-31: 'khor ba ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D1349:50b-32: de'i bde ba ni phreng ba dang tsandan dang bud
T02D1349:50b-33: med la sogs pa nye bar longs spyod pa'i mtshan
T02D1349:50b-34: nyid can no // mi rtag pa ni 'jig pa'i ngang can no //
T02D1349:50b-35: de yang thob pa men te rnyed pa min yang rmongs chen tshol bar byed la /
T02D1349:50b-36: mkhas pa 'khor ba'i bde ba la ltos pa med
T02D1349:50b-37: pa ni yang dag pa'i rgyal srid kyi bde ba
T02D1349:50b-38: 'dor bar byed de yang dag pa'i rgyal po ni
T02D1349:50b-39: 'khor los sgyur ba yin la de'i dngos po ni
T02D1349:50b-40: de nyid de / de'i bde ba thob pa yang ngo //
T02D1349:50b-42: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las nges par grol ba'i ched du'o zhes pa drang ba'i don to //
T02D1349:51a-1: 'khor ba ni phung po dang khams la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D1349:51a-2: de'i bde ba ni dbang po gnyis kyis skyes pa ste /
T02D1349:51a-3: mi rtag pa ni skad cig ba tsam mo //
T02D1349:51a-4: de ma thob kyang ste yan lag can pa'i rang bzhin las so //
T02D1349:51a-5: de lta na'ang tshol bar byed re bar byed do //
T02D1349:51a-6: de nyid kyi phyir gti mug pas na rmongs pa'o //
T02D1349:51a-7: chen po ste rnam par 'byed pa dang bral ba nyid rmongs pa chen po zhes brjod do //
T02D1349:51a-8: mkhas pa ste bden pa mthong ba'i byang chub sems
T02D1349:51a-9: dpa' ni yang dag pa'i rgyal srid kyi bde ba
T02D1349:51a-10: yang dag par 'dor bar byed do //
T02D1349:51a-11: yang dag pa'i rgyal bo ni 'khor los sgyur ba
T02D1349:51a-12: chen po 'og min gyi khang pa na bzhugs pa
T02D1349:51a-13: bcom ldan 'das dpal sh'akya seng ge ste /
T02D1349:51a-14: de'i bde ba ni mtha' yas pa'i yon tan gyi 'bras bu rab tu sbyin pa'o //
T02D1349:51a-16: phyag rgya chen po dang yang dag par 'grogs pa las so //
T02D1349:51a-17: thar ba'i ched du ste mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ched du'o zhes pa ste /
T02D1349:51a-18: nges pa'i don la rton pa nyid la brten par bya'i /
T02D1349:51a-19: drang ba'i don la rton pa nyid la ma yin no //
T02D1349:51a-20: de yang 'dir bde ba chen po'i rtogs par byed
T02D1349:51a-21: pa ste rab tu mnan nas rgyu bar byed pa
T02D1349:51a-22: nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
T02D1349:51a-23: 'o na 'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba thob pa
T02D1349:51a-24: ni khyod kyi thugs kyis sangs rgyas nyid yin la
T02D1349:51a-25: de yang yongs su 'dor ba ni mkhas pa'i rigs
T02D1349:51a-26: can zhes pa ji ltar yin /
T02D1349:51a-27: ci ste 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1349:51a-28: 'jig rten gyi yang dag par 'byung ba ma yin
T02D1349:51a-29: pa las 'das pa'o zhes sems na 'di lta bu
T02D1349:51a-30: lung du mthong ngam ci zhe na /
T02D1349:51a-31: bden mod gsal ba kho nar mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur la sogs par mthong ste /
T02D1349:51a-32: chags pas 'jig rten bskyed pa ste //
T02D1349:51a-34: rdo rje'i chags pa yongs shes las //
T02D1349:51a-35: yid ni rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur //
T02D1349:51a-36: chags pa'i zhags pas bcings pa yis //
T02D1349:51a-38: chags dang bral ba'i mngon byang chub //
T02D1349:51a-39: chags pas bgrod pa rnams kyis nyams //
T02D1349:51a-40: 'jig rten gdul ba rgyur byas nas //
T02D1349:51a-41: 'di ni gzugs rnams du mar byed //
T02D1349:51a-42: ri bong stag dang seng ge dang //
T02D1349:51a-43: glang po rnams kyi rigs rnams su'ang //
T02D1349:51a-44: phyag rgyas grub pa snying rje yis //
T02D1349:51b-0: phan pa'i @51b blo can rnams skye'o //
T02D1349:51b-2: ji skad du don dam pa'i bsnyen par yang 'jug pa'i sems la brten nas gsungs pa /
T02D1349:51b-3: gang rnams sems can don gyi rgyu ru rnams sangs rgyas nyid kyi //
T02D1349:51b-4: bde ba mtha' yas rab tu thob pa yang dag ston mdzad cing //
T02D1349:51b-5: 'khor ba'i dbus su rab tu 'jug par mdzad pa rnams //
T02D1349:51b-6: de rnams zhabs kyi chu skyes dag la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1349:51b-8: de ltar na 'o na 'gyur ba med pa'i bde
T02D1349:51b-9: ba de tshangs par spyod pa'i bde ba dang mtshungs
T02D1349:51b-10: par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na ma yin
T02D1349:51b-11: te / de yang 'dod ldan gyi bde ba dang 'grogs pas non pas te /
T02D1349:51b-12: ji skad du lo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:51b-13: ri dags rnams bza' zhing ldad pa'i ngang tshul 'di'i
T02D1349:51b-14: yin pa zhes pa ri dags zas can de seng
T02D1349:51b-15: ge'o // brgya lam na ste thams cad kyi tshe ma yin no //
T02D1349:51b-17: gal te de lta na yang gnyis ka dag la ni bde ba mchog yod pa ma yin no //
T02D1349:51b-18: ni'i sgra ni yang gi don la'o //
T02D1349:51b-19: de dang ci 'dra bar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1349:51b-21: len cig rtag tu khu ba ltung phyir ro //
T02D1349:51b-22: ji lta bar ro zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:51b-23: ji ltar te gang dang 'dra bar de bzhin te /

T02D1349:55b-1: slob ma dag ba rnams la'o //

T02D1349:58a-22: ldan 'das kyis ci'i don du gsungs she na gsungs

T02D1349:58a-28: gi phyir rang gi sems byin gyis brlab pa so

T02D1349:58a-42: pa slu ba'i chos can la sangs rgyas nyid de
T02D1349:58a-43: de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T02D1349:58a-44: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lam mkhyen
T02D1349:58a-45: pa nyid dang lam gyi rnam pa mkhyen pa nyid
T02D1349:58a-46: dang / stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs
T02D1349:58b-0: pa rnam @58b bar yon tan 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1349:58b-1: can ni 'bras bu ste snying por 'gyur ro //
T02D1349:58b-2: de zad las te 'khor ba zad pa las so //
T02D1349:58b-3: de 'khor ba zad pa'i bar mchod du ci dang 'dra bar 'byung zhe na /

T02D1349:58b-5: pa ste ji ltar snying po med pa'i chu shing

T02D1349:58b-14: sgyu ma ni ma rig pa yin la des 'jug
T02D1349:58b-15: pa'i lo de ji ltar sangs rgyas kyis sgrub par

T02D1349:58b-18: sdig pa ni sh'u ka'i srin bu'o //
T02D1349:58b-19: ku l'i ra ni karka ta'o //
T02D1349:58b-20: gang gi skabs las byung zhing 'byung bar nang gi
T02D1349:58b-21: sgya [?] ma de rnams kyis nyams par byed pa
T02D1349:58b-22: ji lta ba de bzhin zhes pa de ltar rnal
T02D1349:58b-23: 'byor gyi sems te rnal 'byor ni thabs dang shes
T02D1349:58b-25: de la yod pa'i sems ni dbang bzhi pa ste /

T02D1349:58b-28: de rnam par nyams par byed par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1349:58b-29: pa'o // sgyu ma dang bral ba na 'khor ba

T02D1349:58b-31: nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams dbugs dbang ba'i don
T02D1349:58b-32: pa'o // du'o // 'o na byang chub kyi sems
T02D1349:58b-33: ni bems po'i khams su 'dir brjod la de yang
T02D1349:58b-34: bems bo ma yin pa mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i
T02D1349:58b-35: ye shes sangs rgyas nyid kyis sgrub par byed pa
T02D1349:58b-36: ji ltar brjod ce na khu bar 'gyur ba med
T02D1349:58b-37: pa'i rang bzhin gyis mchog tu mi 'gyur ba sgrub
T02D1349:58b-38: par byed ces pa'i gsung gi phyir ro //
T02D1349:58b-39: de nyid kyi phyir de kho na nyid rnal 'byor
T02D1349:58b-40: gyi sems 'di'i mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ngo bos
T02D1349:58b-41: bcu drug bzhi'i rab tu dbye ba gsal bar byed

T02D1349:58b-43: // gnyis zhes bya ba 'khor ba dang mya ngan
T02D1349:58b-44: las 'das pa'i sems te de gang la yod pa
T02D1349:58b-46: nor bu dang padma las g-yo ba med pa'o zhes pa g-yo ba med do //
T02D1349:59a-0: rjes su 'gro ba ste shes rab @59a * //
T02D1349:59a-1: dang thabs kyi bdag nyid 'di la yod pa ma yin no zhes pa rjes 'gro med do //
T02D1349:59a-2: bla na med pa'i bde ba rab tu sbyin pa
T02D1349:59a-3: nyid kyi phyir 'dod pa'o zhes rnal 'byor bzhi pa'o
T02D1349:59a-4: // brgya phrag drug lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu
T02D1349:59a-5: rtsa gcig gis dbugs 'gog pa'i phyir mchog tu mi
T02D1349:59a-6: // 'gyur ba'o // chags pa dang chags pa dang
T02D1349:59a-7: bral ba'i phyogs dkar po dang nag po zhes pa
T02D1349:59a-8: dag gis gnas dang bgrod pa med pa'i phyir 'dod
T02D1349:59a-9: // 'gyur ba'o // chags chen po'o // rnam pa
T02D1349:59a-10: dang bcas pa dang rnam pa med pa las nges
T02D1349:59a-11: par grol ba nyid kyi phyir dngos po dang dngos
T02D1349:59a-13: shes bya ma lus pa mthong ba'i phyir ye shes so zhes pa rnal 'byor gsum pa'o //
T02D1349:59a-14: 'gro ba dga' bar byed pa sngon ma nyid kyi
T02D1349:59a-15: phyir ram chags pa med pa nyid kyi phyir sems
T02D1349:59a-16: dpa'o // dang po dang bar dang tha mar dge
T02D1349:59a-17: ba byed pa nyid kyi phyir kun du bzang po'o
T02D1349:59a-18: dpa'o // // bdud dang nyon mongs pa dang rnam
T02D1349:59a-19: par rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir sgra ste grags
T02D1349:59a-20: pa phyi dang nang gi brjod pa'am yang na rab
T02D1349:59a-21: tu sgrogs shing rnam par lhod pa'i seng ge'i sgra
T02D1349:59a-22: can gyi g-yul 'di la yod pa ma yin pa'o
T02D1349:59a-23: zhes pa sgra 'thab pa med pa'o //
T02D1349:59a-24: gzhom du med pa'i sgra'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir
T02D1349:59a-25: 'di'i sgra ste grags pa chen po'o zhes pas sgra
T02D1349:59a-26: che ba'o zhes pa rnal 'byor gnyis pa'o //
T02D1349:59a-27: 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnam par spangs pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1349:59a-29: sku bzhi'i sgrib pa zad ba'i phyir dpal byang chub sems kyi thig le 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1349:59a-30: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dag dbyer med pa
T02D1349:59a-31: nyid kyi phyir dpal dus kyi 'khor lo rdo rje'o
T02D1349:59a-32: // tshul khrims kyi tshogs yang dag par rdzogs pa
T02D1349:59a-33: nyid kyi phyir shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid rnal
T02D1349:59a-34: 'byor ro zhes pa rnal 'byor dang po'o //
T02D1349:59a-35: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor de
T02D1349:59a-36: 'di kho na rgyud thams cad rgyu dang 'bras bu'i
T02D1349:59a-37: bdag nyid kyis 'bras bu don du gnyer ba rnams
T02D1349:59a-39: dpal ldan dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od kyi rgyud
T02D1349:59a-40: la 'jug pa'i bshad sbyar brgya phrag bcu gsum pa
T02D1349:59a-41: mi g-yo ba'i snying po snang bar lam 'phrog pa'i
T02D1349:59a-42: rgyu mtshan bshad pa'i nges pa ste lnga pa'o /
T02D1349:59b-0: // / da ni gnyis med la sogs pa @59b bcu
T02D1349:59b-1: drug bzhi'i rab tu dbye ba can rdo rje'i rnal
T02D1349:59b-2: 'byor dpal dus kyi 'khor lo 'di nyid kyi go
T02D1349:59b-3: 'phang thob pa'i ched du rim pa ji lta bar
T02D1349:59b-4: rnal 'byor ma'i zhabs dran pas thig le bcu drug
T02D1349:59b-5: gi sgrib pa 'jigs pa chen po'i nye bar 'tshe
T02D1349:59b-6: ba zhi bar byed pa gsungs pa /
T02D1349:59b-7: snying rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:59b-8: snying rje dang stong pa nyid dag ma phyed pas
T02D1349:59b-9: nye bar mtshon pa'i sku 'di'i yin pa zhes pa'o
T02D1349:59b-10: // snying rje ni dmigs pa med pa'i dus shes pa ste /
T02D1349:59b-11: 'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba dang ye shes dang
T02D1349:59b-12: thabs dang snying rje'i bdag nyid ces pa kun rdzob
T02D1349:59b-13: gzugs can ma'o // dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i stong
T02D1349:59b-14: pa nyid rdul phra rab med pa'i ngo bo 'khor
T02D1349:59b-17: dpal ldan shes rab stong nyid bdag / ces 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1349:59b-21: gnyis su med pa shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag
T02D1349:59b-22: nyid dpal dus kyi 'khor lo 'di'i dpal 'jig rten
T02D1349:59b-23: pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs
T02D1349:59b-24: pa rang dang gzhan gyi don gyi mtshan nyid can
T02D1349:59b-25: no // de thob pa'i ched du rnal 'byor ma
T02D1349:59b-26: rnams te rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la
T02D1349:59b-27: sogs pa rnams dang aa wa dh'u t'i la sogs
T02D1349:59b-29: de rnams kyi zhabs bsgom par bya zhes pa kha
T02D1349:59b-30: cig tu gzhan gyi ched kyi tshig can la bdag
T02D1349:59b-32: bgegs nyams pa ni dgra dang seng ge la sogs pa'i nye bar 'tshe ba zhi ba'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:59b-33: bgegs zhi ba de nyid mdor bstan pa gsungs pa dgra dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:59b-34: 'dir rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la
T02D1349:59b-35: la zhig mtshan dang nyin du rnal 'byor ma 'chad
T02D1349:59b-37: kyang gi sgra ni rim pa tha dad pa la
T02D1349:59b-38: ste zhabs kyang dran par byed pa de'i gsal bar
T02D1349:59b-39: te nges par dgra dang seng ge la sogs pa
T02D1349:59b-40: rnams nyams pa ste mthong ba med par 'gyur ro
T02D1349:59b-42: / da ni 'jigs pa chen po bcu drug zhi
T02D1349:59b-43: bar byed pa'i tshigs bcad bcu drug rnams kyis rgyas
T02D1349:59b-44: par bshad pa gsungs pa glang chen zhes pa la
T02D1349:59b-45: sogs pa'o // glang chen ni glang po che'o //
T02D1349:59b-46: shing rta ni shing rta rnams so //
T02D1349:59b-47: rta ni rlung ltar mgyogs pa'i rta'o //
T02D1349:60a-2: glang chen la sogs pa de rnams thams cad kyang
T02D1349:60a-3: yin la go bgos pa'i lus can yang ngo zhes
T02D1349:60a-4: pa'o // phal cher glang po che zhon pa rnams
T02D1349:60a-5: 'dir rang gi lag gis mdung dang shing rta la
T02D1349:60a-6: gnas pas 'khor lo zhes pa mda'i 'khor lo dang
T02D1349:60a-7: rta la zhon pa rnams kyi ral gri dang rkang
T02D1349:60a-8: thang rnams kyi mda' gzhu'o zhes pa mtshon cha'o //
T02D1349:60a-9: de rnams rang gi mtshon rnams kyis bcom ste /
T02D1349:60a-10: rgyal ba'i grags pa thob par 'gyur zhes pa bdag
T02D1349:60a-11: gi ched can gyi tshig can la gzhan ched kyi
T02D1349:60a-13: don ni 'di yin te phyi rol gyi ji lta
T02D1349:60a-14: ba la gnyis kyi stobs rnam par gnon par bya
T02D1349:60a-15: ba'i ched du / lhan cig bgrod par byed do
T02D1349:60a-16: zhes pa g-yul te der gnas pa'i dgra bo shin
T02D1349:60a-17: tu gdug pa dpung yan lag bzhi rnams dang ldan
T02D1349:60a-18: pa gshin rje lta bu 'chi ba'i gnas sde bo
T02D1349:60a-19: che lta bur thogs pa med pa'i nus pa can
T02D1349:60a-20: 'byung ba'i bdag po lta bur drag po'i gzugs can
T02D1349:60a-21: gzhom par mi nus pa gang de yang dka' ba
T02D1349:60a-22: med pas rnal 'byor ma'i zhabs dran pa'i stobs kyis
T02D1349:60a-23: byin rlabs las rang gi mtshon rnams kyi sa bcom
T02D1349:60a-24: nas rgyal ba'i grags pa'i dpal la rten par byed
T02D1349:60a-25: ba'i ched du / do // de bzhin du lus
T02D1349:60a-26: la yang gnyis kyi dpung ste srid pa dang mya
T02D1349:60a-27: ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar dkar po dang
T02D1349:60a-28: nag po'i phyogs 'grogs so zhes pa g-yul te 'dir
T02D1349:60a-29: nor bu dang padma'i lte bar brjod par bya'o //
T02D1349:60a-30: der gnas pa'i ye shes kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D1349:60a-31: dga' ba'i thig le thog ma med pa'i srid par
T02D1349:60a-32: nges par 'byung ba dngos por mngon par zhen pa'i
T02D1349:60a-33: bag chags kyis lhag par bsgos pa srog chags ma
T02D1349:60a-34: lus pa rnams kyis mthar byed gzhan pa lta bur
T02D1349:60a-35: shin tu 'khrugs pa phung po dang khams dang yul
T02D1349:60a-36: dang dbang po'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig pa phyed
T02D1349:60a-37: dang bcas pa'i brgya phrag bcu gsum gyi srog ma
T02D1349:60a-38: 'gags pa'i bdag nyid 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po
T02D1349:60a-39: nyid la sogs pa rnam par nyams pa kun nas
T02D1349:60a-40: skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de skad cig
T02D1349:60a-41: gcig kho na mnyam par bgrod pa'i zhabs bsgom pa'i
T02D1349:60a-42: stobs bskyed pa las yan lag drug gi mtshon rnams
T02D1349:60a-43: kyis nges par bkag ste 'jig rten pa dang 'jig
T02D1349:60b-0: rten las 'das pa'i dpal bsgrubs nas 'gro @60b ba'i
T02D1349:60b-1: don mtha' dag byed par nus par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1349:60b-2: pa'o // da ni seng ge gsungs pa kun nas sgrogs //
T02D1349:60b-4: phyi rol du ni shin tu grags pa'o //
T02D1349:60b-5: nang du seng ge ni sems kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba thig le bskyed pa'o //
T02D1349:60b-6: seng ge'i sgra ni 'gyur ba'i dbugs so //
T02D1349:60b-7: shin tu rnam par 'gyur ba'i gdong ni shin tu skyo bas rnam par khyab pha'i gdong ba'o //
T02D1349:60b-8: mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa ni so'i las kyi sbyor bas shin tu gdug pa'o //
T02D1349:60b-10: gsor ba zhes pa'i don la g-yo ba bzhin pa'o //
T02D1349:60b-11: sder mo gug la brtan pas glang chen myos pa'i klad pa mchog tu 'gems //
T02D1349:60b-12: 'khyog cing rno ba'i rtse mo can rnams brtan zhing ring ba'ang sen mo de rnams te //
T02D1349:60b-13: de rnams kyis myos pa'i damshtra dang sa ni'i bum
T02D1349:60b-14: pa dag ste nu ma zung dag gang gis mchog
T02D1349:60b-16: rab khros ni khams 'khrug par gyur pa'o //
T02D1349:60b-17: nyi ma shar ba'i mig can ni chags pa bdo
T02D1349:60b-18: ba skyes pa las nyi ma shar ma thag pa'i
T02D1349:60b-20: ro 'dzin ral gri g-yo ba ni phyag rgya'i kha

T02D1349:60b-22: pa'o // ral pa can ni nor bu dang padma'i ge sar dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1349:60b-23: gsod 'dod ni thig le lhung ba dang ldan pa'i phyir 'chi bar byed 'dod pa'o //
T02D1349:60b-24: ring du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni dri ma med pa nyid du gyur pas 'gro'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:60b-25: glang po'i bdag po ni 'dir ngag gis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i thig le'o //
T02D1349:60b-26: mdog sngo zhes pa dung can ma'i rtsa ste chung
T02D1349:60b-27: du las gzhan rgyas par byad pa'i phyir kha dog
T02D1349:60b-29: 'chi ltas 'byung ba'i phyir mig ser skya ste 'dren byed dri ma can no //
T02D1349:60b-30: myos byed ni lag ldan gyi d'a na la zhu ba gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1349:60b-31: de nas 'gram pa gnyis po myos byed chu ni rab tu mang bas gang /
T02D1349:60b-32: 'gram pa gnyis po'i bar ji srid pa ste kha cig tu ring po la thung ngu'o //
T02D1349:60b-33: rab tu mang ba'i sgra las gnyis pa'i ma da
T02D1349:60b-34: theb ste bdag nyid kyi sbyor ba las shes pa
T02D1349:60b-35: ba bcol du rjes su 'brel pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D1349:60b-37: shes rab kyi sgra rtsad nas 'byin par byed cing

T02D1349:61a-1: len la sprin bzhin sgra sgrogs byed ces pa'i don
T02D1349:61a-2: la sgrogs bzhin pa ste dbugs 'byung bar byed bzhin
T02D1349:61a-3: pa'o // bcing ba ni au ra'i zhags pa ste sprul gyi zhags pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1349:61a-4: rtse mo ni thor to'i cha'o //
T02D1349:61a-5: so'i rtse mos 'byed par byed de nor bus rab tu stobs la sogs pa byed pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1349:61a-6: de yang so sor ldog pas khams mtha' dag g-yo
T02D1349:61a-7: ba byung ba 'dis kyang de'i lus gtong bar byed

T02D1349:61a-11: phyogs dang mtshams su ste rim pas g-yon pa'i yan
T02D1349:61a-12: lag dang g-yas pa'i yan lag gi lag pa dang
T02D1349:61a-13: rkang pa la sogs pa rnams su'o //

T02D1349:61a-15: du ste rna ba dang sna la sogs pa dang
T02D1349:61a-16: gdong la sogs pa rnams su rab tu dga' ba
T02D1349:61a-17: shin tu brten pa las du ba ste gyen du
T02D1349:61a-18: g-yo ba yin zhing des mun pa ste dbang po
T02D1349:61a-20: chen po ste rab tu gyur pa'i myur thug par
T02D1349:61a-21: skyes pa'i kun du du ba'i mun pa gang gis

T02D1349:61a-26: dgon pa ni gsang ba'i pad ma ste /
T02D1349:61a-27: de dag gcig ste bar ma chad pa yang 'di
T02D1349:61a-28: yin la bsregs pa yang 'di'o zhes pa de dang
T02D1349:61a-29: 'di yang gtum mo 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor las so
T02D1349:61a-30: zhes pa'o // dus kun du shin tu dga' ba'i
T02D1349:61a-31: dus tshod ji ltar 'gyur bar ro zhes ba bya
T02D1349:61a-33: 'chi ba ni byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D1349:61a-34: phyogs kun gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i mtha'i mtshan nyid can no //
